mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fire_alert_log ( label, confidence, video_url, image_path, location, admin_judgment, alert_status, alert_time, notes, detected_at, created_at ) VALUES ( #{label}, #{confidence}, #{videoUrl}, #{imagePath}, #{location}, #{adminJudgment}, #{alertStatus}, #{alertTime}, #{notes}, #{detectedAt}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, label, confidence, video_url AS videoUrl, image_path AS imagePath, detected_at AS detectedAt, created_at AS createdAt, location, admin_judgment AS adminJudgment, alert_status AS alertStatus, alert_time AS alertTime, notes FROM fire_alert_log ORDER BY detected_at DESC
